message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, a chain can be constructed from Thomas to David, showing that Thomas is an ancestor of David. Specifically, Thomas → Brandon → Alan → Kevin → Ronald → Hannah → Maria → Betty → Judith → Michael → Dylan → Charles → Gregory → Lori → Danielle → Ashley → Benjamin → Douglas → Carol → Rachel → Elizabeth → Grace → Katherine → Catherine → Lauren → Christine → Raymond → Walter → Diane → Cynthia → Emily → Donald → Stephen → Jose → Henry → Samuel → Richard → Logan → Diana → Joe → Nathan → Doris → Nicole → Joan → Samantha → Willie → Amy → Bryan → Austin → Stephanie → Elijah → Christina → Albert → Sarah → Timothy → Gerald → Peter → Roger → Angela → Shirley → Nicholas → Steven → Beverly → Victoria → Alexander → Carolyn → Laura → Janet → Jeffrey → Patricia → Tyler → Theresa → Adam → Heather → Virginia → Christopher → Mason → Rebecca → Kyle → Kelly → Jesse → George → Evelyn → Martha → Carl → William → Zachary → Kayla → Ann → Jerry → Ralph → Donna → Janice → Natalie → Frank → Eugene → Vincent → Joyce → Russell → Randy → Gary → Charlotte → Sandra → Gloria → Joseph → Isabella → Joshua → Amber → Cheryl → Kenneth → Pamela → Mary → Dorothy → Alice → Frances → Helen → Barbara → Patrick → Sara → John → Robert → Amanda → Ruth → James → Megan → Jonathan → Sophia → David.

Therefore, David is Thomas's descendant.

<ANSWER>3</ANSWER>
